system.description:
Trigger: An ally resolves a [Pledge] attack.
Effect: The user may use this attack as an [Interrupt], increasing the Power of this attack to 150, the Range to 10m, and upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses the appropriate [Pledge Combo] attack based on this attack and the triggering attack as if the [Pledge Combo] attack was on the user's Active List.
